channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: ollama /ollama
item.description: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models.

item.title: rustdesk /rustdesk
item.description: An open-source remote desktop application designed for self-hosting, as an alternative to TeamViewer.

item.title: asdf-vm /asdf
item.description: Extendable version manager with support for Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Erlang & more

item.title: songquanpeng /one-api
item.description: LLM API 管理 & 分发系统，支持 OpenAI、Azure、Anthropic Claude、Google Gemini、DeepSeek、字节豆包、ChatGLM、文心一言、讯飞星火、通义千问、360 智脑、腾讯混元等主流模型，统一 API 适配，可用于 key 管理与二次分发。单可执行文件，提供 Docker 镜像，一键部署，开箱即用。LLM API management & key redistribution system, unifying multiple providers under a single API. Single binary, Docker-ready, with an English UI.

item.title: ChatGPTNextWeb /NextChat
item.description: ✨ Light and Fast AI Assistant. Support: Web | iOS | MacOS | Android | Linux | Windows

item.title: sgl-project /sglang
item.description: SGLang is a fast serving framework for large language models and vision language models.

item.title: krahets /hello-algo
item.description: 《Hello 算法》：动画图解、一键运行的数据结构与算法教程。支持 Python, Java, C++, C, C#, JS, Go, Swift, Rust, Ruby, Kotlin, TS, Dart 代码。简体版和繁体版同步更新，English version ongoing

item.title: infiniflow /ragflow
item.description: RAGFlow is an open-source RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) engine based on deep document understanding.

item.title: GoogleCloudPlatform /generative-ai
item.description: Sample code and notebooks for Generative AI on Google Cloud, with Gemini on Vertex AI

item.title: ocrmypdf /OCRmyPDF
item.description: OCRmyPDF adds an OCR text layer to scanned PDF files, allowing them to be searched

item.title: Mintplex-Labs /anything-llm
item.description: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, and more.
